   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to UK Crime Dashboard's documentation!
==============================================

**UK Crime Dashboard** is a Dash web application illustrating statistical crime data among cities in the UK. The data is pulled from the UK Police API, a JSON endpoint.

.. note::

   This project is under active development.
   
Contents
--------

.. toctree::

   functions
   tests
